casebody.data:
L. A. THOMPSON SCENIC RAILWAY COMPANY, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Charles W. ANDERSON, Individually, etc., DefendantAppellee. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. January 20, 1929. No. 155. Victor C. Cormier, of New York City, for appellant. Thomas J. Crawford, of New York City, for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed in open conrt.
